channel.title: tmux on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in tmux on Bodacious Blog

item.title: Automating tcl/expect
item.description: Using tmux, expect and bash I made a script which you can use to automate practically anything on the command line in an easy way. Build the x script #!/bin/bash export TTY ( hs "$(basename "$0")" "$@" </dev/tty ` # Disable tty to pipe content into hs ` ) # Consider using this # man expect-lite # Related: scripts using x # $HOME/scripts/xs # example 1: this adds and starts a git commit message # x -m "\`" -m t -m e -m v -i PANE_ID="$(tmux display-message -p -t $TMUX_PANE '#{pane_id}' 2>/dev/null)" SHELL=zsh input_filter() { # I don't want to escape \n sed 's/\([[;$"]\)/\\\1/g' # qne # cat return 0 } export TMUX= tf_script="$(ux tf script exp | ds xlast || echo /dev/null)" script_append() { # printf -- "$1" >> "$tf_script" # echo -e "$1" >> "$tf_script" lit "$1" >> "$tf_script" return 0 } script_append "#!

item.title: Searching awesome lists for curated web browsing
item.description:
Here I demonstrate searching through and reading lists of things from the command line. I ran into some issues with the googlesearch pip module It seems to have been taken down from pip. I changed my script to use emacs’ eww browser to scrape the results instead eww is pretty reliable. Demonstration Please be patient as I bypass the problem above.
Some search results from the demonstration above http://linear.

item.title: Meta & Inception
item.description: This is a blog article about writing a blog article about recording myself recording myself playing tetris inside emacs inside tmux inside neovim inside spacemacs, inside the 5 nested tmux sessions seen at the bottom of the screen. DONE tetris inside of emacs etetris-vt100 DONE tetris inside of neovim terminal inside of tmux nvt etetris-vt100 DONE tetris inside of neovim terminal inside of tmux inside of spacemacs sp -sh nvt etetris-vt100 DONE asciinema recording of an asciinema recording of tetris inside of neovim terminal inside of tmux inside of spacemacs Meta inception
